DOC.brief_summary: The purpose first multi-dose study cancer patient determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) recommend phase II dose ( RP2D ) , characterize safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics profile . Once MTD establish and/or RP2D chosen , study enroll patient expansion portion study .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study LFA102 Patients With Prolactin Receptor-positive Castration-resistant Prostate Cancer Prolactin Receptor-positive Metastatic Breast Cancer

Presence prolactin receptor primary metastatic tumor ( Dose Escalation ) 4 . Suitable venous access blood sample 1 . Prior treatment antiprolactin receptor antibody 2 .
